title: Bettencourt de Vasconcellos. (Jo達o)
body: He moved with his father to Terceira Island, where he was beheaded in 1582 by order of Manuel da Silva, Count of Torres Vedras, for being a supporter of Philip II of Castile.

Jo達o Bettencourt de Vasconcellos: Moved with his father to Terceira Island and was beheaded in 1582 by order of Manuel da Silva, Count of Torres Vedras

1582: Jo達o Bettencourt de Vasconcellos beheaded by order of Manuel da Silva, Count of Torres Vedras
